name: Melody Cardigan
description: The Melody Cardigan is a very simple knitting pattern which is easy to follow and pleasent to knit.
full_text: The Melody Cardigan is a very simple knitting pattern which is easy to follow and pleasent to knit. You will need: XS: 2 skeins S: 3 skeins M: 3 skeins L: 4 skeins XL: 4 skeins of Kid Silk by Woollala.com* (each skein is 420 metres in 50 grams) If you want your cardigan to be longer you should have more yarn! 9 mm 120 cm and 40 cm circular needles (it’s the most comfortable but you can use shorter if you wish) 8 mm 120 cm circular needles (it’s the most comfortable but you can use shorter if you wish) 5 mm double pointed needles (or you can use the Magic Loop techniqe) 8 stitch markers 2 additional needles or thrads to hold the resting stitches Tapestry needle Have fun knitting!
